Which version of Ant were you using?

This bug has been fixed by a change in the code in the past.

Previous, fireBuildFinished(Project project, Throwable error) worked on the 
iterator of the location collection of build listeners.

This has been changed so that we iterate (correctly and safely) on the cloned 
collection of the full set of registered project build listeners.

Luc please verify that my assertions are correct (no recent change in the 
code).

I don't see any changes in InternalAntRunner#fireBuildFinished since at least
the beginning of 2003.
Darin: I don't see any clone of the collection ?

YOu are correct Luc there has not been any changes for quite a long period of 
time (as mentioned in comment #4)

Project.getBuildListeners (Apache Ant code base) does a clone on the Vector.

Verified.
